meta.title: Dual List
meta.abstract: View data in a dual list component.

body.p: This list makes possible select items. The selected items is in right side and the unselected itens stay in left side.

p.code: <editform title="Dual List sample"> <duallist> <leftlist caption="Not selected" size="6" name="left"> <item id="1" text="One" /> <item id="3" text="Three" /> <item id="4" text="Four" /> </leftlist> <rightlist caption="Selected" size="6" name="right"> <item id="2" text="Two" /> </rightlist> <button type="text" all="true" from="left" to="right" value="All to Right" /> <button type="text" all="false" from="left" to="right" value="One To Right" /> <button type="text" all="false" from="right" to="left" value="One To Left" /> <button type="text" all="true" from="right" to="left" value="All To Left" /> </duallist> </editform>
